PageTitle: display bgp vpnv4 multicast all group
FuncDef: The display bgp vpnv4 multicast all group command is used to display the BGP VPNV4-Multicast peer group information.
CLIs: display bgp vpnv4 multicast all group
display bgp vpnv4 multicast all group <group-name>

ParaDef.Info:
Specify a peer-group.
The name is a string of 1 to 47 case-sensitive characters, with spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv4 multicast all group
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp vpnv4 multicast all group command is used to display the BGP VPNV4-Multicast peer group information.
